Articles.Content:
Here's a battleship I made earlier today, took a little while to make and disappointingly broke symmetry in the VAB so I'm having issues building a launcher for it.

.craft file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/bjdghwn23frqb2b/SGA-%20Atlas.craft

Ps. Feel free to have a go building something to get this into orbit, and if you manage it please tell me/link me the .craft file! (Prefer to keep it stock though)
Looks nice, really good armor, I will gladly use it for target practice
It reminds me of a submarine now i have to go watch hunt for red October!
LOL. P.S. tom clancy is a great writer

First of all, are you sure it will actually work in space? The 5 engine design sure looks cool and all, but I find it nearly impossible to balance the thrust. I'd advise you to make sure it goes straight first before attempting to make a launcher for it.
